name: roguelite-phaser
description: A Roguelite game made with Phaser

scripts.desktop: yarn build && npx cap copy && npx cap open electron
scripts.ios: yarn build && npx cap copy ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.platform:ios: yarn build && npx cap add ios
scripts.platform:desktop: yarn build && npx cap add electron
scripts.platforms: yarn build && npx cap add electron && npx cap add ios
